name: part_009
file: tmp_【#わための誕生日2021】３Ｄお誕生日パーティー！！！【角巻わため⧸ホロライブ４期生】 [UHLdoq-T-mA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Watame thanks the audience after her performance.
Watame starts announcing her birthday celebration goods.

subtitles.original: OK!
subtitles.english: OK!

subtitles.original: では...
subtitles.english: Then...

subtitles.original: いきましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: ヴィラン。
subtitles.english: Villain.

subtitles.original:
ヴィラン
作詞・作曲：てにをは
subtitles.english:
Villain
Lyrics & Composition: teniwoha

subtitles.original: きっと手を繋ぐだけで　ゾッとされる
subtitles.english: Surely just holding hands, you'll be shuddered at

subtitles.original: ラットレース一抜けたら　通報される
subtitles.english: If you get out of the rat race first, you'll be reported

subtitles.original: ミュータントじゃない　ただの僕さ
subtitles.english: I'm not a mutant, I'm just me

subtitles.original: XとかYとか
subtitles.english: X and Y and such

subtitles.original: べき論者様は　善悪多罪
subtitles.english: The 'should-be' theorists are full of good, evil, and many sins

subtitles.original: 僕が君を侵害するって　言いふらしてる
subtitles.english: They're spreading rumors that I'm infringing on you

subtitles.original:
Oh Mr. Crazy Villain Villain
蛇蝎の如く花弁
subtitles.english:
Oh Mr. Crazy Villain Villain
Petals like a snake-scorpion

subtitles.original: 違う服着て　君の前では男子の振りする
subtitles.english: Wearing different clothes, I pretend to be a boy in front of you

subtitles.original:
拝啓　Dr. Durr-ra-Durr-ra
迎えに来てください
subtitles.english:
Dear Dr. Durr-ra-Durr-ra
Please come and pick me up

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない　誰かにとって僕はもうヴィラン
subtitles.english: To someone who knows nothing, I'm already a villain

subtitles.original: 蛇蝎が辛い　蛇蝎が辛い
subtitles.english: The snake-scorpion is hard, the snake-scorpion is hard

subtitles.original: 挙げ句の果ての　ヴィラン
subtitles.english: At the end of it all, a villain

subtitles.original: 逸脱の性がまた　ひた隠す
subtitles.english: The nature of deviation is hidden once more

subtitles.original: 雄蕊と雄蕊じゃ　立ち行かないの
subtitles.english: With stamen and stamen, it won't work out

subtitles.original:
ねぇ　知ってんの？
カランボルトにパッチにポッチ
subtitles.english:
Hey, did you know?
A bolt, a patch, and a nub

subtitles.original: 造花も果ては　実を結ぶ
subtitles.english: Artificial flowers will eventually bear fruit

subtitles.original: 腐ってんじゃねぇよ　多種多様の性
subtitles.english: Don't be rotten, diverse genders

subtitles.original: 悲しい悲しい　話をしようか　ゼラチン質の
subtitles.english: Shall we tell a sad, sad story? A gelatinous one

subtitles.original:
Oh Mr. Crazy Villain Villain
可能性に幸あれ
subtitles.english:
Oh Mr. Crazy Villain Villain
Happiness to the possibilities

subtitles.original: 僕のハートは1LDK　独り占めさせてよ
subtitles.english: My heart is a 1LDK, let me have it all to myself

subtitles.original:
はい　ずっと　ヨロ・ヨロ
微熱抱いていいのに
subtitles.english:
Yes, always staggering
It's okay to hold onto a slight fever

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない　知られたくない　皮膚の下
subtitles.english: Nobody knows, I don't want anyone to know, under the skin

subtitles.original: 素晴らしき役を　共に捧げる歌
subtitles.english: A song dedicated together to the wonderful role

subtitles.original: 骨までしゃぶり尽くしてやりゃ　阿修羅に
subtitles.english: If you suck it dry to the bone, you'll become an Ashura

subtitles.original: 残酷な町ほど　綺麗に日が沈む
subtitles.english: The sun sets more beautifully in the cruelest towns

subtitles.original: 我儘勝手に　踊る操り人形（ポップ）みたいな
subtitles.english: Selfishly dancing like a marionette

subtitles.original: みんな行くぞー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, let's go!

subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない　誰かにとって僕はもうヴィラン

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: Thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: 聴いてくれて本当にありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for listening!

subtitles.original: いや、やっぱり歌は難しい、本当に難しいけど、楽しい！
subtitles.english: Man, as expected, singing is hard, it's really hard, but it's fun!

subtitles.original: 特にみんなにこうやって聴いてもらって、

subtitles.original:
同じ時間を共有してもらえることが本当に、
本当にかげがえのない時間だなぁと思います。
subtitles.english:
and sharing the same time, I think it's truly, 
truly an irreplaceable time.

subtitles.original: では、ここでアレいきましょうかね。
subtitles.english: Well, let's go with *that* now.
